meaningMnemonic: It's <kanji>not</kanji> <kanji>possible</kanji> to <kanji>lack</kanji>. It is <vocabulary> indispensable</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>essential</vocabulary>, so don't lack it!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
